languages.text: "Это союз рабочих и техноматов, что трудились в нижних ярусах Сципионы. Мелкие начальники вахт и смен, небесполезные простолюдины, отметившие себя успехами в труде и ценными знаниями. Конечно, они стоят куда ниже почтенных торговцев, не говоря уж об аристократах крови, но... Чернь любит слушать подобных себе, у бригадиров есть авторитет и умение управлять людьми".

"This is a union of the workers and the technomats who have been working on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed merchants, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."
languages.original_text: "Это союз рабочих и техноматов, что трудились в нижних ярусах Сципионы. Мелкие начальники вахт и смен, небесполезные простолюдины, отметившие себя успехами в труде и ценными знаниями. Конечно, они стоят куда ниже почтенных торговцев, не говоря уж об аристократах крови, но... Чернь любит слушать подобных себе, у бригадиров есть авторитет и умение управлять людьми".

traits.locale_text: "This is a union of the workers and the Technomats who have been working on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who proved their worth with their diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... The common folk like their kin, and the brigadiers have the authority and the ability to manage people."

Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... The common folk like their kin, and the brigadiers have the authority and the ability to manage people."

Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed Trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the brigadiers have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed merchants, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the foremen have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

languages.text: “这群人是由工人和技工组成的工会，此前一直在希皮奥内巢都底层工作。他们都是些负责监督轮班的小头领，或是有用的普通人，用勤奋的劳动和宝贵的知识证明了自己的价值。当然，他们的地位比不上尊贵的商人，更遑论与贵族相提并论，不过……普通百姓更擅长留意他们的同类，而警督也有权力和能力管理他们。”
languages.original_text: "This is a union of the workers and the technomats who have been working on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed Trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the brigadiers have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

traits.locale_text: “这群人是由工人和技工组成的工会，此前一直在希皮奥内巢都底层工作。他们都是些负责监督轮班的小头领，或是有用的普通人，用勤奋的劳动和宝贵的知识证明了自己的价值。当然，他们的地位比不上尊贵的商人，更遑论与贵族相提并论，不过……普通百姓更擅长留意他们的同类，而警督也有权力和能力管理他们。”

languages.text: «Este es un sindicato de los obreros y los tecnómatas que han estado trabajando en los niveles inferiores de Escipión. Patrones de guardias y de turnos a pequeña escala, plebeyos útiles que han demostrado su valía con un trabajo diligente y valiosos conocimientos. Por supuesto, están muy por debajo {mf|del|de la} estimable Comerciante, por no hablar de los aristócratas, pero... la gente común hace caso a sus parientes, y los brigadistas tienen tanto la autoridad como la capacidad para dirigirlos».
languages.original_text: "This is a union of the workers and the technomats who have been working on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed Trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the brigadiers have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

traits.locale_text: «Este es un sindicato de los obreros y los tecnómatas que han estado trabajando en los niveles inferiores de Escipión. Patrones de guardias y de turnos a pequeña escala, plebeyos útiles que han demostrado su valía con un trabajo diligente y valiosos conocimientos. Por supuesto, están muy por debajo {mf|del|de la} estimable Comerciante, por no hablar de los aristócratas, pero... la gente común hace caso a sus parientes, y los brigadistas tienen tanto la autoridad como la capacidad para dirigirlos».

languages.text: 「これは、サイピオーネの下層で働く労働者とテクノマットの組合です。監視とシフト管理を行う少数のリーダーたちと、勤勉に働き、貴重な知識でその存在価値を証明してきた役に立つ庶民で構成されています。もちろん、立派なトレーダーよりはるかに低い地位にいる、貴族なら言うまでもないだ...だが、庶民はキンの言うことを聞き入れる、それに准将は彼らを管理する権限も能力も有しています」
languages.original_text: "This is a union of the workers and the technomats who have been working on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed Trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the brigadiers have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

traits.locale_text: 「これは、サイピオーネの下層で働く労働者とテクノマットの組合です。監視とシフト管理を行う少数のリーダーたちと、勤勉に働き、貴重な知識でその存在価値を証明してきた役に立つ庶民で構成されています。もちろん、立派なトレーダーよりはるかに低い地位にいる、貴族なら言うまでもないだ...だが、庶民はキンの言うことを聞き入れる、それに准将は彼らを管理する権限も能力も有しています」

languages.text: « C'est un syndicat regroupant les ouvriers et les technomates qui travaillaient dans les niveaux inférieurs de Scipione. Dans l'ensemble, ce sont des petits chefs, des gens ordinaires ayant prouvé leur valeur en travaillant avec diligence et disposant de précieuses connaissances. Évidemment, ils sont bien plus bas dans l'échelle sociale que les libres-marchands, sans même parler des aristocrates, mais... le petit peuple écoute les siens, et les Brigadiers ont sur lui une forme d'autorité qui les rend aptes à le gérer. »
languages.original_text: "This is a union of the workers and the technomats who have been working on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed Trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the brigadiers have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un syndicat regroupant les ouvriers et les technomates qui travaillaient dans les niveaux inférieurs de Scipione. Dans l'ensemble, ce sont des petits chefs, des gens ordinaires ayant prouvé leur valeur en travaillant avec diligence et disposant de précieuses connaissances. Évidemment, ils sont bien plus bas dans l'échelle sociale que les libres-marchands, sans même parler des aristocrates, mais... le petit peuple écoute les siens, et les Brigadiers ont sur lui une forme d'autorité qui les rend aptes à le gérer. »

languages.text: "Das ist eine Vereinigung der Arbeiter und der Technomaten, die auf den untersten Ebenen von Scipione gearbeitet haben. Niedere Aufseher der Wachen und der Schichten, nützlicher Pöbel, der seinen Wert durch fleißige Arbeit und wertvolles Wissen bewiesen hat. Natürlich stehen sie deutlich unter {mf|dem angesehen Freihändler|der angesehenen Freihändlerin}, geschweige denn den Aristokraten, aber ... der Pöbel hört auf seinesgleichen, und die Brigadiere haben wohl die Autorität als auch die Fähigkeit, ihn zu führen."
languages.original_text: "This is a union of the workers and the technomats who have been working on the lower levels of Scipione. Small-scale bosses of the watches and the shifts, useful common folk who have proved their worth with diligent labour and valuable knowledge. Of course, they stand much lower than the esteemed Trader, let alone the aristocrats, but... the common folk heed their kin, and the brigadiers have both the authority and the ability to manage them."

Niedere Aufseher der Wachen und der Schichten, nützlicher Pöbel, der seinen Wert durch fleißige Arbeit und wertvolles Wissen bewiesen hat." Natürlich stehen sie deutlich unter {mf|dem angesehen Freihändler|der angesehenen Freihändlerin}, geschweige denn den Aristokraten, aber ... der Pöbel hört auf seinesgleichen, und die Brigadiere haben wohl die Autorität als auch die Fähigkeit, ihn zu führen."
